sentences.en: A mysterious being in the equatorial forest.
sentences.cn: 热带森林里的神秘存在.

sentences.en: An equatorial mounting of the camera has a great advantage.
sentences.cn: 将照相机赤道式安装很有利.

sentences.en: Embassy of the Republic of Equatorial Guinea?
sentences.cn: 赤道几内亚共和国大使馆?

sentences.en: Here we distinguish azimuthal and equatorial mountings as well as fixed and transportable instruments.
sentences.cn: 比如说有地平式和赤道式装置,有固定式和移动式的等等.

sentences.en: It is very hot in equatorial jungles.
sentences.cn: 赤道附近的丛林里很热.

sentences.en: Plants from equatorial regions have large, thin sparsely hairy leaves.
sentences.cn: 在赤道地区其植物叶片大而薄,并被以稀毛.

sentences.en: Saturn itself has an equatorial diameter of about 120,000 kilometers.
sentences.cn: 土星的赤道直径大约有12万公里.

sentences.en: South of the equatorial region is the tree - dotted grassland called the savanna.
sentences.cn: 赤道地区以南是一片树木稀少的草原,称为热带草原.

sentences.en: The earth has the equatorial diameter greater than the polar diameter.
sentences.cn: 地球的东西直径大于南北直径.

sentences.en: The equatorial diameter exceeds the polar diameter by 26 miles.
sentences.cn: 赤道直径超过极地直径26英里.

sentences.en: The equatorial portion should tend to swing outward.
sentences.cn: 近赤道的部分会有向外凸出的趋势.

sentences.en: The working projection plane is taken at the equatorial plane corresponding to the ground surface.
sentences.cn: 工作投影面为赤道平面―相当于地平面.

sentences.en: Those that are aligned in the place are called equatorial hydrogens.
sentences.cn: 那些在平面上定向的氢叫做平伏氢.

sentences.en: Too much rain is the problem of the equatorial lands in the Amazon and Congo basins.
sentences.cn: 雨水过多是亚马逊河与刚果河流域赤道地区的大问题.

sentences.en: We flew south through the equatorial night.
sentences.cn: 我们穿过赤道的夜空向南飞行.

words.tran_cn: 赤道的，近赤道的；中纬线的

phrases.tran_cn: n. 赤道几内亚（西非国家）
